comment.author: 61232251@N05
comment._content:
We just received a phone call from ex-mariner Frank Foster who has identified this boat with help from Mr. Ron Humphries (Yacht Club Historian).

This vessel was registered at the Boston Yacht Club at Marblehead. It was owned by Mr. W.R. Cameron of Dorchester, Mass. He joined the club in 1908. It's a 36.8 ft motor launch. 

Mr. Foster was able to identify the vessel through the flags and features on the ship. Thank you!
